message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'd be willing to make a deal at that price.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $90, which I think is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $80. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $85.
